channel.title: Please Stop!
channel.description:
Please people stop posting abvertisments on the server download page or any-page on this website there is a place to abvertise the website is called: http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php? It's super easy! 1.log in 2.go to register server 3.put server information in 4.folow direction's given It's not to hard people you already know what is going to happen if you do it read the rules! http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,312149.0.html
PLEASE STOP ABVERTISING IN THE SERVER-DOWNLOADS SPOT!!!!
Thank-you if you havent posted any abvertiseing on the server-downloads :) If you have please stop befor it is to late!!!!it gets anyyoing when i think it is a server download :mad:
Thankyou for reading this post :)

this is already stated in the rules.

item.title: Please Stop!
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

Are you serious?

You’re the biggest wannabe “Omgihassticky” and the biggest wannabe mod I’ve ever seen.
There’s a thing called “Private message”, for a reason.

EDIT:

Maybe if you wanted a sticky you could make this thread half decent.

  1. Your spelling is shit.
  2. Your grammar looks like my puke mixed with tar.
  3. We don’t care about advertisers.

Read full topic
